SEARCH

All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
ApartmentBusinessService
Service class for managing apartment business logic Handles CRUD operations for apartments
ApartmentController
Controller class responsible for handling apartment-related requests Provides methods for displaying, updating, deleting, and creating apartments
ApartmentDataService
Service class that handles data access logic for apartments Implements the DataAccessInterface for CRUD operations on apartments
ApartmentEntity
Entity class representing an apartment in the database Maps to the "APARTMENTS" table and provides properties for apartment details
ApartmentInterface
Interface for apartment business services Defines CRUD operations for apartments
ApartmentMapper
Mapper class for mapping rows of the "APARTMENTS" table to ApartmentEntity objects Implements RowMapper interface to map database rows to entities
ApartmentModel
Model class representing an apartment with details such as name, number of beds, baths, floor space, price, and quantity.
ApartmentRepository
Repository interface for managing ApartmentEntity objects in the database Extends CrudRepository to provide basic CRUD operations for the "APARTMENTS" table
ApartmentRestService
REST API service for managing apartments Provides endpoints to fetch apartment data
ApartmentXApplication
Main entry point for the ApartmentX Spring Boot application
ApartmentXUser
Represents a user in the apartment system.
AuthenticationBusinessService
Service class for handling authentication logic Provides methods for authenticating users based on username and password
AuthenticationInterface
Interface for authentication services Defines methods for authenticating users
DataAccessInterface<T>
Interface for data access operations Defines methods for CRUD operations: create, read, update, and delete
HomeController
Controller class responsible for handling the home page request Provides method for displaying the home page
LoginController
Controller class responsible for handling login functionality Provides methods for displaying the login page and handling login success
PasswordGenerator
Class for generating encoded passwords using BCrypt Demonstrates encoding a raw password using BCryptPasswordEncoder
RegisterController
Controller class responsible for handling user registration functionality Provides methods for displaying registration form, submitting user registration, and handling admin registration
RegistrationBusinessService
Service class for handling user registration logic Provides methods for adding users to the system and managing lifecycle methods
RegistrationInterface
Interface for user registration logic Defines methods for adding users and managing lifecycle methods
SecurityConfig
Security configuration class for the application Configures authentication and authorization settings
SpringConfig
Configuration class that defines beans for various business services
UserBusinessService
Service class for managing user details and authentication logic Implements Spring Security's UserDetailsService interface
UserContoller
Controller class responsible for handling user-related functionality Provides methods for displaying users, updating user information, and deleting users
UserDataService
Service class that handles data access logic for user entities Implements DataAccessInterface and UsersDataAccessInterface for CRUD operations on users
UserEntity
Entity class representing a user in the database Maps to the "USERS" table and provides properties for user details
UserModel
Represents a user in the apartment system.
UserRepository
Repository interface for managing UserEntity objects in the database Extends CrudRepository to provide basic CRUD operations for the "USERS" table
UserRowMapper
Mapper class for mapping rows of the "USERS" table to UserEntity objects Implements RowMapper interface to map database rows to UserEntity objects
UsersDataAccessInterface<T>
Interface for data access operations related to users Provides methods to interact with user data, specifically for retrieving user details by username
